name: Milky Way Motors
description:
Alien space ships need fixing too. What other place to send in your ship for repairs than Milky Way Motors! All ships are in good hands with workshop owner Scruffy and his talented assistant De-De on the job. Though repairing ships is no easy task. Scruffy and De-De must use their math skills to solve the problem for all ships. Help them fix as many ships ships as possible before closing time!

By:

Nelson Schneider

Carter Greene

Gabriel Rickabaugh

Gabriel Hurst
